title: Consistent "Trouble find that site" Errors on Windows 11
content:
Recently I upgraded my Windows 10 to Windows 11 and since doing so, I've had consistent errors while browsing the web on Firefox. Most notably the "Humm. We're having trouble finding that site." error message.

For example, when visiting, say Verizon.com, the tab will display the aforementioned error to which I press Try Again and the website loads correctly every-time. No hiccups on the refresh.

I've tried the following:

  1. I've performed a completely clean uninstall of Firefox and then reinstall
  2. Cleared all browser history/cache
  3. Removed all extensions
  4. Disabled IPv6, HTTPS Over DNS, No Proxy
  5. Ran through Firefox's troubleshooting
  6. Used Firefox Troubleshooting Mode in the Browser
  7. Tested that the problem does not happen while using Edge

I've never had a single problem on Windows 10 with Firefox. Curious if others are experiencing the same issues and if there are any fixes. Nothing else on the PC has changed.

  • Windows 11 21H2 2200.348
  • Network driver is the latest Win11 edition
  • Firefox 95
creator: justincv22

title: css code to customize Bookmark Toolbar DropDowns
content:
Hi, I have an issue with making the separators in the bookmark toolbar drop-downs visible. I am running Firefox 95 with the Quantum - dark Blue theme installed. I am running Linix Mint Uma.

The dropdown have separator - space - but no line showing that there is a separator. I have tried many ways to make the separators visible and with light-grey colouring in the userChrome.css file but nothing changes.

Anybody have any idea what can be done or where I might change the Quantum-DarkBlue coding to incorporate the visible separators?

Haagen

title: Youtube da hızlı arama yapamıyorum.
content: Windowsta firefox üzerinde youtube a girince ç tuşuna basarak direk arama çubuğunu kullanabiliyorum. Linux te ise bu tuş . olarak değişiyor ama firefox ta bunu kullanamıyorum. Diğer tarayıcılarda sorun yok, "." tuşu ile direk arama kısmına gidiyor ama firefox ta bunu yapamıyorum. Ayarlardan yazmaya başlar başlamaz arama yap seçeneği de kapalı.

title: firefox nezobrazuje stránky správně - porovnání mobilů mobilmania
content:
na stránkách mobilmania v sekci katalog je možnost porovnání mobilních telefonů když vložím telefony k porovnání nezobrazí se mi možnost přepnout se na samotné porovnání v chromu mi ze spodní části vyjede lišta s výběrem a s tlačítkem zobrazit nevím jak lépe správně technicky a terminologicky problém popsat

další problém mám v - zná li někdo - s Home Assistant - kde se mi nezobrazuje jedna ze stránek, pouze problikne a vrátí se na opouštěnou stránku.

když použiji nový čistý profil zdá se že věci fungují OVŠEM zase mi nefunguje autologin na některé stránky který v původním profilu funguje

title: programs asking to update FireFox
content:

Does anyone have a solution? Are sites not accepting tracking and ad blocking now? I also use DuckDuckGo for search engine.

Would appreciate some words of wisdom on this.

Thank you, Bonsaibill
